bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r, Aero Race Design, FACT IS construction, internal cable routing, 1-3/8" lower HS bearing, carbon OSBB shell

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
